name: Girafi – referral program
author: Girafi.co

sections.description:
Referral from a friend will always have more impact than a message from your brand.

  • Customers are 4x more likely to buy when referred by a friend. 
  • Referred customers bring 25% higher profit margin.

How it Works?

Your website visitors send their friends a unique link with a special discount. Once their friends make their purchase through the link, the referrer will also receive a discount.

Your customers can refer your business via:
* Facebook, Twitter, Messenger
* Whatsapp, SMS, E-mail
* Unique Link
sections.installation:
CREATE YOUR GIRAFI ACCOUNT

FOR FREE HERE!

FROM YOUR WORDPRESS DASHBOARD (RECOMMENDED)

  1. Go to Plugins > Add New
  2. Search for: Girafi
  3. Click on Install Now to install and activate the plugin

FROM WORDPRESS.ORG

  1. Download the latest version zip file
  2. Go to Plugins > Add New
  3. Click on Upload Plugin to upload the zip file
  4. Activate the plugin after the installation

Configuration

  1. Go to Plugins > Girafi
  2. Fill-out your Giraf JS Snippet from Girafi Dashboard
  3. Click on Save changes and it’s done!
